item.title: Shortest Path in Polygons
item.author: sunsp.gis@gmail.com (Shipeng Sun)
item.description: Finding the shortest path between two points within a (simple) polygon can be efficiently solved by using the funnel algorithm. For more details, see blog 1, blog 2, Paper 1 and Paper 2. A good implementation in Python is available at GitHub margaeor
